system.descriptionText: Wearer can make a +10 Tech-Use Test as a Half Action. If Successful each chatacter within 10 metres must make a -20 Strength Test or suffer 1d10 Impact Damage ignoring Armour. If failing by 3+ Degrees of Failiure, are also pushed 1d5 metres away from wearer and knocked prone.

description.value: Wearer can make a +10 Tech-Use Test as a Half Action. If Successful each chatacter within 10 metres must make a -20 Strength Test or suffer 1d10 Impact Damage ignoring Armour. If failing by 3+ Degrees of Failiure, are also pushed 1d5 metres away from wearer and knocked prone.
